revision.comment: [[Wikipedia:Bots/Requests for approval/APersonBot 8|Bot]] updating 1 category with sort keys for an article about a battle
revision.text:
{{infobox military conflict | conflict = Battle of Geyve
Geyve Çatışması | partof = [[Turkish War of Independence]] | image = | caption = | date = 15–17 May 1920 | place = [[Geyve]], [[Ottoman Empire]] | result = Decisive Kuva-yi Milliye victory * Kuva-yi Inzibatiye forced to retreat to Adapazarı * Eventual dissolution of the Kuva-yi Inzibatiye | status = | combatant1 = {{flagicon|Ottoman Empire|1828}} [[Ottoman Empire]]
'''Supported by:'''
{{flag|United Kingdom}} | combatant2 = {{flagicon image|Ottoman_flag_alternative_2.svg}} [[Government of the Grand National Assembly|Grand National Assembly]] | combatant3 = | commander1 = {{flagicon|Ottoman Empire|1828}} [[Ahmet Anzavur]] | commander2 = {{flagicon image|Ottoman_flag_alternative_2.svg}} [[Ali Fuat Cebesoy|Ali Fuat Pasha]] | commander3 = | units1 = | units2 = | units3 = | strength1 = 3 infantry regiments (4,000 men) | strength2 = 1 Corps | strength3 = | casualties1 = | casualties2 = | casualties3 = | notes = | campaignbox = }} {{Campaignbox Greco-Turkish War}} The '''Battle of Geyve''' was a small but decisive engagement fought during the [[Turkish War of Independence]]. It was different from other battles of the war as forces of the [[Grand National Assembly of Turkey|Grand National Assembly]] directly fought forces of the [[Ottoman Empire|Constantinople government]], which was under [[Allies of World War I|Allied occupation]].[http://forum.memurlar.net/konu/1831001/ Hilafet Ordusu] ==References== {{reflist}} [[Category:Turkish War of Independence|Geyve]] [[Category:History of Sakarya Province]] [[Category:1920 in the Ottoman Empire]] {{Turkey-mil-stub}} {{Mil-hist-stub}}
